item.title: John Fetterman and Lindsey Graham advocate for the destruction of Iran's nuclear program
item.description: Sens. Lindsey Graham and John Fetterman both want Iran's nuclear program to be destroyed.

item.title: Law enforcement on high alert for Trump inauguration after 2024 assassination attempts
item.description: Federal, state, and local law enforcement officials will be on high alert on Jan. 20 when President-elect Donald Trump gets sworn into office.
